content:
Here are a few recent articles on the subject of conducting medical interviews with anxious patients:

1. "Assessing and Managing Anxiety in the Medical Interview" by John R. Docherty and John C. Rumsfeld, published in the Journal of General Internal Medicine in 2019.
2. "Patient Anxiety and the Medical Interview" by David M. Thom and J. Wesley Boyd, published in the Journal of Clinical Psychology in 2018.
3. "Anxiety and the Medical Interview" by David M. Thom and J. Wesley Boyd, published in the Journal of General Internal Medicine in 2017.
4. "Effective Communication in the Medical Interview with Anxious Patients" by David A. Etzioni and Elizabeth A. Kato, published in the Journal of General Internal Medicine in 2016.

It's good to note that these are just examples, and you can find more recent or more specific articles by searching on PubMed or other databases and filtering by date, keyword and journal.
